privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.privacyNoticeDesc: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. These settings help you control how your information is shared and used.
privacy.selectProfileVisibility: Select who can see your profile
privacy.selectActivityStatus: Select who can see your activity status
privacy.analyticsTrackingDesc: Help us improve by allowing anonymous usage analytics
privacy.dataSharingDesc: Allow sharing of anonymized data for research
privacy.thirdPartySharingDesc: Allow sharing data with trusted third-party services
privacy.locationSharingDesc: Share your location for location-based features
privacy.selectDataRetention: Select how long to keep your data
privacy.selectContactVisibility: Select who can see your contact information

accessibility.title: Accessibility Settings
accessibility.accessibilityNoticeDesc: We are committed to making our platform accessible to everyone. These settings help customize your experience based on your needs.
accessibility.fontSizeDesc: Adjust the size of text throughout the application
accessibility.lineSpacingDesc: Adjust the spacing between lines of text
accessibility.focusIndicatorsDesc: Show clear focus indicators for keyboard navigation
accessibility.keyboardShortcutsDesc: Enable keyboard shortcuts for common actions
accessibility.simplifiedInterfaceDesc: Show a simplified version of the interface
accessibility.confirmationDialogsDesc: Show confirmation dialogs for important actions
accessibility.reduceMotionDesc: Reduce or eliminate animations and transitions
accessibility.colorBlindFriendlyDesc: Use color blind friendly color schemes

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.warningDesc: Be careful with data management operations. Exporting and importing data can affect your account settings and preferences.
dataManagement.exportDesc: Download a copy of your data for backup or transfer to another account.
dataManagement.importDesc: Import data from a previously exported file. This will overwrite your current settings.
dataManagement.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
